name: The Gudla of Hell
description: Prepare for some serious punishment in this huge level for Doom2. An awesome level with more monsters then the monster condoe. The whole level is like red bricks and is very hot with lotsa slime passagewayes. Unlike my older levels this one uses the same texture everyiwhere and is a bit of a maesz in places to your knowlege. Your mission is to get the blue key in a red level and get the hell outta here to the spirit world.
